tests: INSERT INTO qa_result (run_id, assertion_id, concept_id, details)
SELECT <RUNID>, '<ASSERTIONUUID>', d.conceptid, concat('Current concept (', c.id, ')  with "infantile" in any term not modelled with "Occurrence " = "Infancy": ', term)
assertionText: Current concept with "infantile" in any term not modelled with "Occurrence " = "Infancy"
shortName: infantile in term modelled with occurrence
docRef: SNOMED CT Style Guide: Clinical Findings Section2.12 Occurrence
